panels.title: We've rethought the phone. Now it's a statement

text: Join us live at 6pm on Thurs 19th Aug
Watch The Tech Chap put the new Galaxy Z Fold3 and Z Flip3 to the test live from Samsung KX. Join us to take advantage of an exclusive offer*.
*Purchase from Samsung Shop Online by 21st August 23:59. Apply code at checkout to redeem. Limited to one code per transaction. Discount code capped at 300 orders. While stocks last.
